arts.ttl: Harry Maguire salvages a Europa League point for 10-man Manchester United
arts.sum: The substitute’s goal rescued a draw for Erik ten Hag’s team, after captain Bruno Fernandes was dismissed.
Aidan Perkins previews all 10 Premier League games this weekend and has a score prediction for each match.

arts.ttl: FC Porto vs Manchester United – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United visit FC Porto in the Europa League tonight, in what promises to be an entertaining clash in Portugal. With Erik ten Hag’s job security in the balance, the result of this game could either be the catalyst for positive change or push the Dutchman closer towards the exit door. There’s even more pressure […] The post FC Porto vs Manchester United – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Porto vs Man Utd: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Manchester United will hope to ease their woes on Thursday night when they visit Porto in the Europa League after their horrendous defeat to Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday. A 2-0 defeat away to champions Sporting CP is the only blemish on Bruno's domestic record so far, but Porto were also beaten in their opening league phase fixture by Bodo/Glimt last week.

arts.ttl: FC Porto v Man Utd Lineups and Starting 11s for Europa League Match
arts.sum: FC Porto and Manchester United go head-to-head in the Europa League on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: Porto vs Manchester United predictions: Porto can add to Red Devils' woes
arts.sum: Manchester United were both outthought and outfought against Tottenham on Sunday and Jack Ogalbe believes things could get worse when they head to Porto in the Europa League.
